response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to us, but we understand its worth from your perspective might be different. We're offering it to you at a special price of $12,000, which we believe strikes a fair balance between its value and what you're looking to invest. We're confident this product will meet your needs and expectations. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
